vig3_math

vig3_math.Rmd

Model for single time period

ya∼Poisson(γawa)\begin{equation} y_a \sim \text{Poisson}(\gamma_a w_a) \end{equation}

logγa=βaage\begin{equation} \log \gamma_a = \beta_a^{\text{age}} \end{equation}

Priors for age effect βaage\beta_a^{\text{age}}:

Case 1: Second-Order Random Walk

βaage−βa−1age∼N(βa−1age−βa−2age,σage2),a=2,⋯,A\begin{equation} \beta_a^{\text{age}} - \beta_{a-1}^{\text{age}} \sim \text{N}\left(\beta_{a-1}^{\text{age}} - \beta_{a-2}^{\text{age}}, \sigma_{\text{age}}^2\right), \quad a = 2, \cdots, A \end{equation}

where

σage∼N+(0,sage2)\begin{equation} \sigma_{\text{age}} \sim \text{N}^+(0, s_{\text{age}}^2) \end{equation}

Case 2: Spline

𝛃age=𝐗𝛂αa−αa−1∼N(αa−1−αa−2,σage2)\begin{align} \pmb{\beta}^{\text{age}} & = \pmb{X} \pmb{\alpha} \\ \alpha_a - \alpha_{a-1} & \sim \text{N}\left(\alpha_{a-1} - \alpha_{a-2}, \sigma_{\text{age}}^2\right) \end{align}

where

σage∼N+(0,sage2)\begin{equation} \sigma_{\text{age}} \sim \text{N}^+(0, s_{\text{age}}^2) \end{equation}

Model for multiple time periods: Main effects

yat∼Poisson(γatwat)logγat=βaage+βttime\begin{align} y_{at} & \sim \text{Poisson}(\gamma_{at} w_{at}) \\ \log \gamma_{at} & = \beta_a^{\text{age}} + \beta_t^{\text{time}} \end{align}

Priors for age effect βaage\beta_a^{\text{age}} same as for single-time-period model

Prior for time effect:

βttime∼N(0,σtime2)\begin{equation} \beta_t^{\text{time}} \sim \text{N}(0, \sigma_{\text{time}}^2) \end{equation}

Model for multiple time periods: Interaction

yat∼Poisson(γatwat)logγat=βaage+βatage:time\begin{align} y_{at} & \sim \text{Poisson}(\gamma_{at} w_{at}) \\ \log \gamma_{at} & = \beta_a^{\text{age}} + \beta_{at}^{\text{age:time}} \end{align}

Priors for age effect βaage\beta_a^{\text{age}} same as for single-time-period model

Prior for age-time effect βatage:time\beta_{at}^{\text{age:time}}:

𝛃tage:time∼N(𝛃t−1age:time,σ2𝚽)\begin{equation} \pmb{\beta}_t^{\text{age:time}} \sim \text{N}(\pmb{\beta}_{t-1}^{\text{age:time}}, \sigma^2 \pmb{\Phi}) \end{equation} where 𝚽=[1ρρ2…ρT−1ρ1ρ…ρT−2ρ2ρ1…ρT−3⋮⋮⋮⋱⋮ρT−1ρT−2ρT−3…1]\begin{equation} \pmb{\Phi} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & \rho & \rho^2 & \dots & \rho^{T-1} \\ \rho & 1 & \rho & \dots & \rho^{T-2} \\ \rho^2 & \rho & 1 & \dots & \rho^{T-3} \\ \vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ \rho^{T-1} & \rho^{T-2} & \rho^{T-3} & \dots & 1 \end{bmatrix} \end{equation}
